name: We Are Masks
description:
WE ARE MASKS (Motte Aishiteru)

So this dates back to 2016, with Motte Aishiteru being the original. I was looking through old notebooks and found the concepts for it and where we had wanted to go with it. Well, I decided to revamp it with one of the original ideas and my current twist. Hope you all enjoy! I'll be uploading different versions each month or so. Starting with the very first original game!
